definition: surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort
Ban Ki Moon (1944-), Korean diplomat, UN secretary-general 2007-2016
Pan Yue (247-300), later known as 潘安[Pan1 An1], famous handsome and elegant writer from the Western Jin dynasty
Pan Jinlian (name lit. Golden Lotus), heroine of Ming dynasty vernacular novel Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus 金瓶梅
Songpan county (Tibetan: zung chu rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Songpan county (Tibetan: zung chu rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Panji district of Huainan city 淮南市[Huai2 nan2 shi4], Anhui

sentences.english: Mordo takes his power and says there's too many sorcerers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 莫度奪走了潘伯恩的法力，說世界上的魔法師太多了。

sentences.english: The americans decided penkovsky was a provocation.
sentences.chinese: 美國人認定潘科夫斯基的事是一種圈套。

sentences.english: Situated in the southern part of Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, Lushan Mountain is on the bank of Poyang Lake (1).
sentences.chinese: 廬山坐落在潘陽湖岸邊，江西省九江市內的南部。

sentences.english: Even about Pen himself, Mrs. Greed's reports were desperately favourable.
sentences.chinese: 甚至對潘本人，克理德太太的報告也是極爲有利的。

sentences.english: "Some lost their jobs and the remainder had to work harder, " said Mr. Pan.
sentences.chinese: 潘教授稱“有些人失業了，其他的必須更辛苦地工作。

sentences.english: I am planning a party for Pam.
sentences.chinese: 我在爲潘計劃安排一個派對。

sentences.english: Situated in the southern part of Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, Lushan Mountain is on the bank of Poyang Lake.
sentences.chinese: 廬山坐落在潘陽湖岸邊，江西省九江市內的南部。

sentences.english: Like Peter pan, he can never grow up.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡彼得潘，他可以永遠不長大。

sentences.english: A Braavosi trading galley called at Pentos on her way back from the Jade Sea.
sentences.chinese: 一艘布拉佛斯商船在從翡翠海的歸途中在潘託斯休整。

sentences.english: Let us in the Boke Lane Laopan find some Flash remarks.
sentences.chinese: 那麼就讓我們一起在老潘的博客裏尋找一些閃光言論。

sentences.english: He is cosmetic medicine's Peter Pan.
sentences.chinese: 他的美容醫學簡直就是小飛俠彼得潘。

sentences.english: All my students call me Lao Pan .
sentences.chinese: 我所有的學生都叫我老潘。

sentences.english: Family shareholders and board members will learn a great deal from Dr. Pendergast s new book.
sentences.chinese: 家族股東和董事會成員將汲取潘德加博士大量新書。

sentences.english: President Pena Nieto was waiting for his guest at the National Palace for bilateral talks.
sentences.chinese: 總統潘尼亞尼託在國家宮等待奧巴馬進行雙邊會談。

sentences.english: "Are you quite sure of that, Pencroft?" asked the engineer, looking at the sailor.
sentences.chinese: “你能肯定嗎，潘克洛夫？”工程師看着水手問道。

sentences.english: Pan soon found himself in disagreement with some of his scientific colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 潘文石很快發現自己與他的一些科研同行產生了分歧。

definition: to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
